> <OLD - Tuscon>
>
> Tucson continues Eastward in the direction Rodimus was pointing.  The wind
> was strong and fast enough to carry him on outstretched wings as he glides
> swiftly across the darkening sky.  Then a faint scent catches his nostrils.
>
> " We're in the right direction, Rodimus.  I can smell him.  Neither Maximal,
> Autobot, Decepticon or Predacon.  It's far more foul than that.  I believe
> I've just locked in on our query. "
>
> A mighty dragon on the hunt, Tucson swiftly flies onward and spots a mech
> floating in the air, hovering.  Not having encountered Saberback, he stops
> and circles the area around him.
>
> " Rodimus, be ready.  Leo Prime, We're here.  I have the enemy sighted."
>
> Tucson makes himself heard with a very loud roar.

<NEW>

OOC: Sandy, since you posted Tuscon as arriving already I am doing a
small time jump.

OOC: Airly, several hours have passed and I am merging the post
between Tuscon and the Preds. The Preds are carrying out Hydras' last
order, to burn the Dinosaurs. Feel free to post yourself where you
like. See the end of the post for your cue.

BIC:

The mighty dragon that is TUSCON moved swiftly over mountains, rivers
and valleys, great forests pass beneath TUSCon and his passenger.
TUSCON's powerful wings propel him through the open skies pausing only
as thermals and updrafts allow him to soar giving him precious moments
of rest as he continued his flight.

He has covered hundreds of miles in the space of a few hours and the
sun has set, disappearing behind the ever distant horizon. Stars wink
at TUSCON and RODIMUS pleasently like bright jewles on black velvet,
the moon like some giant baubel, glowing brightly.

"Will you look at that." RODIMUS said in awe as he pointed ahead of them.

As TUSCON arrives at where he would have thought their enemy to be he
realizes that it was not the scent of the stranger that he caught, but
it was the strong aroma of dead flesh mixed with fire, smoke and
burning meat. There is a great fire going on, one that seems to be
raging for miles.

In the distance TUSCON can pick up the definite scent of Predacon
energy signatures, their dark forms darting over the fire looking
almost like moths over a bright flame. However these moths are firing
blasts of energy at the fire keeping it bright and hot.

Even as TUSCON was picking up the Predacons, they seemed to be
becoming aware of him as well as several of them fanned out
defensively.

*****************************

At the same time HYDRAS also gets a message from FRACTYL, "Sir. We are
picking up a strange Maximal signature is approaching the area of the
burning Dinosaurs. It is quite large and approaching quickly."

(TAG)

Preston
